title: Pierrepoint: The Last Hangman
occurrences: Pierrepoint...
Oh, Mr. Pierrepoint.
Pierrepoint. We don't have a delivery today.
It's what he wanted. Another Pierrepoint on the list.
Mrs. Pierrepoint, can you help me out with this stocktake tonight?
I don't mind, Mr. Sellers. Mr. Pierrepoint is away tonight anyway, so...
Thank you, Mrs. Pierrepoint.
14 and a half seconds, Pierrepoint. Most satisfactory.
...I leave Albert Pierrepoint outside.
I don't mind telling you, Pierrepoint, I don't think there's a better man in the country.
I'm sorry, Mrs. Pierrepoint. This is Jessie, my lady friend.
Ah, Pierrepoint.
Pierrepoint, this is Field Marshal Montgomery.
"The eyes of the world are on us, Mr. Pierrepoint. After what the Nazis..."
But I understand that you adopt a more sophisticated method, Mr. Pierrepoint.
Well, you're the man for me, Mr. Pierrepoint.
- Mr. Pierrepoint. - Aye.
Pierrepoint, good to see you again.
Don't know what we'd have made of this back in civvy street, eh, Pierrepoint?
Mr. Pierrepoint?
Mr. Pierrepoint.
Mentioned you by name. Albert Pierrepoint, they said.
Good luck to you, Mr. Pierrepoint.
Mr. Pierrepoint.
It's Pierrepoint, the murderer.
Albert Pierrepoint. It is you, isn't it?
- I'm sorry, madam. I can't help you. - Oh, please, Mr. Pierrepoint.
Please, Mr. Pierrepoint.
Please, Mr. Pierrepoint.
Ah, there you are, Pierrepoint.
We don't want any fuss, do we, Pierrepoint?
It's Mr. Pierrepoint.
It's Albert Pierrepoint who is now the target of the crowd's fury.
